oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: |han=kass'o (Klein Jantje) (VIII)
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: !xen (Dirk) is afraid of the female steenbok, who has a baby steenbok, and throws dust in the steenbok's eyes to make it afraid of him (as he is of it). 1) p.7958v: |han=kass'o heard this from !xen himself; !xen and his relations (he was |han=kass'o's cousin); what the people say about the steenbok; the |xam term for a man who teases or tricks people, 2) This story is found in Book VIII-22.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Lucy Lloyd |xam notebooks
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: !xen and the steenbok
